snippet: Ty Lawson scored 24 points, Arron Afflalo added 23 and Denver ended Cleveland’s four-game winning streak with a 106-97 victory.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Denver Nuggets end Cleveland Cavaliers’ four-game winning streak with a 106-97 victory; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Ty Lawson scored 24 points, Arron Afflalo added 23 and Denver ended Cleveland’s four-game winning streak with a 106-97 victory.

headline.main: Cavs’ Streak Is Broken as Nuggets Pull Away
headline.print_headline: Cavs’ Streak Is Broken as Nuggets Pull Away
